title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Honoring all that is ephemeral and changeable about life contains its own sweet joy today. Its natural to feel sad when you think about the people you love and positive experiences that have faded away. However, you can be grateful for all the pain and sorrow that has also vanished with the past, like difficult family dynamics or a streak of bad relationships. These kinds of unpleasant memories put current tough times into a healthy perspective. All things must pass. Poet Maya Angelou wrote, The horizon leans forward, offering you space to place new steps of change. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
